items.title: Judge pauses Trump federal employee buyout offer pending court hearing
items.description: A lawsuit says the Trump administration's offer of a buyout to federal employees is unlawful, noting that Congress has not appropriated money for it.

items.title: Tariffs: How they work, who pays for them and why Trump loves them
items.description: President Donald Trump in his inaugural speech credited President William McKinley for making the United States "very rich" through tariffs.
